metaTags.title: Selection Process: Come be a part of Zenith || Zenith EESC
metaTags.description: Every year we open a Selection Process to recruit new members. Be a part in the Selection Process and help us to conquer the Space!

processoSeletivoHero.title: Selection Process
processoSeletivoHero.subtitle: Would you like to be a part of Zenith Aerospace?

processoSeletivoCard1.title: How to participate?
text: Every year we open a selection process to recruit new members.
Unfortunately, we can't accept everyone, so we must have a selection process.
Undergraduate students from USP SÃ£o Carlos and UFSCar can participate in our selection process and */no/* previous knowledge is needed!
*/Interested?/* Check out if our selection process is open.

processoSeletivoCard2.title: Timeline
processoSeletivoCard2.detail: We're looking forward to meeting our new members this year. In */2021/*, our selection process will be 100% on-line! To participate, fill in the */Google Forms/* below and follow us in our */Social Networks/* to be notified when the results come out!.

processoSeletivoCard3.title: Selection Process Parts
text: In this part, the candidates will be divided in */groups/* and exposed to a */problem-situation/* inspired by real space missions. We will evaluate the candidate's affinity with */teamwork/*, */leadership/* predisposition and */creativity/* when facing a problem.

In the 2nd part, the remaining candidates will be interviewed by Zenith Aerospace's members from multiple departments. Our goal in this part of the process is to get to know the candidate better, learning more about their */motivations/* and */expectations/* towards the group.
